name: Siuuu
description: The best Web 3.0 platforms for football fans worldwide - SIUUU! With a combination of football, gamefi, defi and socialfi, SIU2022 allows players to join our ecosystem and get rewards from in-game NFT. Football fans across the world can now not only watch exciting matches and top-notch tackles, but also engage in a brainstorming penalty shootout against other players and make correct predictions to get rewarded.
